## JsonRpcProvider.stateCall() method

runs the given message and returns its result without any persisted changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stateCall(message: Message, tipSetKey?: TipSet): Promise<InvocResult>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | Message |  |
|  tipSetKey | TipSet |  |
